Deprecated Interfaces

          Use PlugInListener 
org.joone.util.OutputPluginListener
          Use PlugInListener 
 

Deprecated Classes

Deprecated Methods

          Use AbstractConverterPlugIn.addPlugInListener(PlugInListener)

          Use AbstractConverterPlugIn.convertPatterns() 
org.joone.engine.BatchLearner.getBatchSize()
          use monitor.getBatchSize()

          use monitor.getBatchSize()

          Use getEndDate instead

          Use getStartDate instead

          use getInputFile instead

          use getInputFile instead

          use monitor.setBatchSize()

org.joone.util.AbstractConverterPlugIn.setNextPlugin(AbstractConverterPlugIn)
          AbstractConverterPlugIn.addPlugIn(AbstractConverterPlugIn) 
org.joone.io.StreamInputSynapse.setPlugin(ConverterPlugIn)
          StreamInputSynapse.addPlugIn(ConverterPlugIn). If you want to replace the plug in by setting a new plug in please use #removeAllPlugIns(ConverterPlugIn) and StreamInputSynapse.addPlugIn(ConverterPlugIn). 
org.joone.io.StreamOutputSynapse.setPlugIn(OutputConverterPlugIn)
          use StreamOutputSynapse.addPlugIn(OutputConverterPlugIn) 
org.joone.io.YahooFinanceInputSynapse.setSymbol(String)
          Use setEndDate instead 
 

Deprecated Constructors
org.joone.engine.BatchLearner(int)
          use BatchLearner() and set the batch size with monitor.setBatchSize()
